content: unleash your creativity with the bravo beanie crochet pattern this intermediate-level design offers a fun and engaging project for crocheters of all skill levels the pattern includes sizes for babies toddlers teens and adults making it a versatile option for the whole family worked in the round from the top down this beanie features a ribbed texture that adds depth and style to the finished piece using lion brand jeans worsted weight yarn you ll achieve a cozy and comfortable beanie perfect for chilly days with clear written instructions crocheters can easily follow along and create a beautiful accessory to wear or gift **unique features-** versatile sizing options for babies toddlers teens and adults top-down construction for seamless finishing ribbed texture adds depth and style clear written instructions for easy following uses high-quality lion brand jeans yarn for a cozy feel **materials needed-** \-yarn lion brand jeans worsted weight 1207 yards hook 5 5mm us size 9 hook 5 5mm us size 9 0 gauge 7 stitches by 5 row = 2 inches in double_crochet
